channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drains in road adjacent to Number 6 and 7, 13th February
item.description:
During the storm on 13th February the avenue became flooded and was in danger of over flowing into number 9, drive and property. Both drains showed signs of being blocked. The water has subsided. Leaves were not removed from the Avenue last Autumn. They have partly been removed recently but some piles still remain. These leaves left since the autumn could have caused the drains to be blocked.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 96, The Avenue, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ambrook road Drain blocked and masssive puddle up to the dior on the car parked there, 13th February
item.description:
Ambrook road the drain is blocked yet again causing a massive puddle which has gone across the pavement and grass and is up against the flats. If you kept the drains clear this wouldn't happen

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ambrooke Road, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding in road in radnor avenue, 13th February
item.description:
Resident has called up today to report that ther eis flooding in the road in radnor avenue, he stated there was a tanker there yesterday trying to unblock this but it hasnt worked. Can someone look into this urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Radnor Avenue, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is drain cover near BMW show room that requires urgent attention, 13th February
item.description:
There is a manhole cover in the road near BMW showroom in Maidstone Road, that has sunk to a sub standard level of the road, which causes vehicles to drive around the manhole which will cause some damage to their vehicles if driven over the manhole. This matter requires urgent attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 149, Maidstone Road, North Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 20m puddle on Hamilton Road, from corner to #1, 13th February
item.description:
Floods reliably after rain, multiple times since December. Covers half the road and extends past the drive of 1 Hamilton Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hamilton Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drainage that area requires unblocking, 13th February
item.description:
When it rains the two drains that are between the corner and the speed hump are blocking which causes that part of the to road floods. The water level is over the kerb level which causes pedestrian and motorists to avoid the flooded area, this matter requires urgent attention to resolve and prevent any further flooding.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pinnacle Hill, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Woburn Square by the play area(the map won't allow me to note it there). It is opposite Birkbeck BabyLab, 13th February
item.description:
